results.title: MapElements
results.content:
MapElements is an award-winning, cloud-based service, created for analyzing wireless, cable, broadcast and landline network intelligence. 

MapElements was three years old when I completely re-designed the interface. Due to resources, the re-design was limited to some re-organization and cosmetic issues.  Originally it was confusing to use, with most of the features hidden under an enormous settings dropdown. I gave it a completely new look. I simplified the interface and organized the incredibly feature rich application, into a more intuitive and streamline experience.
results.role: Sole UI/UX designer and helped build the front-end.
